snippet.title: Tinder Profile Grid: Awesomeness of UIStackView in Interface Builder (Ep 1)
snippet.description:
The UIStackView component was introduced to the iOS community a few years back and I never really started using it until early last year.  Turns out, once you get a solid understanding of this component, you can layout a lot of custom UI very, very easily. In today's video, I wanted to illustrate how to make the Tinder Profile screen using some of the tricks with UIStackView and width ratios.  Enjoy.
